Get Involved

Applying for the programme

The Accelerate Programme welcomes applications from departments across the university. Please ensure you specify that you would like to be on this programme when you make your initial application to your chosen course.

Further information: https://www.cst.cam.ac.uk/admissions/acs

Thanks for contacting us, we'll be in touch soon!

Accelerate Science is building a community of researchers working at the interface of AI and the sciences. As we build this community, we’d like to keep in touch! To find out more about our work and forthcoming activities, you can sign up for our mailing list.

Find Us:
